CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Complaint concerning the excessive length of the second set of proceedings admissible;Remainder inadmissible;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
